description: View your media on the go with the ultra-thin protective folio and stand in one. Minimal and sleek, this versatile case lets you enjoy your Acer Iconia comfortably with multiple viewing angles that's perfect for email and chatting. The fashion-inspired case hugs your Acer Iconia and protects it from scratches and scuffs, with a cover that folds to protect the screen and an inner lining that's soft and smooth against your device. Lightweight and form-fitting, it slips easily into another bag without bulk, with a secure closure that holds your Acer Iconia tight.
title: Belkin UltraThin Folio Case for Acer Tablet 10.1in (Midnight Black)
